  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82913</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Temperature dependence of radiation emission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperaturabhängigkeit der Strahlung Emission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La dépendance de la température de l'émission 
de rayonnement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dependência da temperatura da emissão da 
radiação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dipendenza di temperatura dell'emissione di 
radiazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξάρτηση θερμοκρασίας της εκπομπής ακτινοβολίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dependencia de la temperatura de la emisión de 
la radiación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These graphs illustrate the relationships of power and wavelength of emitted radiation to the temperature of the emitting object.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">emission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">power</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme veranschaulichen die Verhältnisse 
der Energie und der Wellenlänge der ausgestrahlten Strahlung zur 
Temperatur der ausstrahlenden Nachricht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces graphiques illustrent les relations de la 
puissance et de la longueur d'onde du rayonnement émis à la 
température de l'objet d'émission.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes gráficos ilustram os relacionamentos da 
potência e do wavelength da radiação emissora à temperatura do 
objeto emitindo-se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi grafici illustrano i rapporti di potenza e 
della lunghezza d'onda di radiazione emessa alla temperatura 
dell'oggetto d'emissione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι γραφικές παραστάσεις επεξηγούν τις σχέσεις 
της δύναμης και του μήκους κύματος της εκπεμπόμενης ακτινοβολίας 
στη θερμοκρασία του εκπέμποντας αντικειμένου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos gráficos ilustran los lazos de la potencia
y de la longitud de onda de la radiación emitida a la temperatura del
objeto que emite.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Emission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlänge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">émission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La température</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">longueur d'onde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">emissão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
